short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Super easy way to use GPT. Select & click to auto fill your prompt.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select contents on the webpage and click menu items from the popup context menu. It will auto fill contents into corresponding template and send the prompt.
